title: Swap Valentine card decorative pig plushies to 5 user-provided images (top-only)

requirements.summary: Update ValentineQuestionCard to render exactly 5 decorative pig plushies, all positioned in the top area of the card content (none near the bottom).
acceptanceCriteria: The question card renders exactly 5 decorative pig plushie images.
All 5 pig plushies are positioned in the top area (e.g., top-left/top-right/top-center region) and none appear at the bottom of the card.
No other parts of the UI (text, buttons, seal, bouquet) are removed or functionally changed.

file_operations.description: Refactor the decorative pig plushies section so there are exactly 5 elements and all are absolutely positioned within the top region of the CardContent container (e.g., top-left/top-right/top-center placements); remove any bottom-positioned pigs while keeping the rest of the card UI unchanged.

requirements.summary: Stop using pig-plushie.dim_256x256.png and use 5 visually different local pig images for the decorative plushies (no duplicates).
acceptanceCriteria: None of the decorative pig elements in ValentineQuestionCard.tsx reference /assets/generated/pig-plushie.dim_256x256.png anymore.
The 5 decorative pigs displayed are visually different from each other (do not count duplicate uploads as separate).

file_operations.description: Replace the decorative pig src values to reference five distinct local pig assets (no repeated src), ensuring /assets/generated/pig-plushie.dim_256x256.png is no longer referenced anywhere in this component.

requirements.summary: Add the 5 user-provided pig plushie images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them locally from ValentineQuestionCard (no external hotlinks).
acceptanceCriteria: All pig plushie images used by ValentineQuestionCard.tsx are served from /assets/generated/* and exist in frontend/public/assets/generated.
No decorative pig image uses an external URL in its src attribute.
